A place for barbecue and coaches to sit. Shop nearby. Outside a city. Very nice owner. Call directly +40754490236. They speak English and Espanol.

name: Hiking trailhead
description: This is no place to spend more than one night. It’s not even very special. But it’s a good spot to spent a night before heading off for a hike next day. There’s a creek running by that has clear water when not raining.

name: Next to stream
description: We stayed here for a night. Multiple places to stay, next to a river stream. Most places are visible from the road, which was very quiet when we stayed here. There was a possibility to park our car behind a small bush to block the view from the road, which we did not use. Flat area with used firepit and no trash. When we stayed here, 100 meters further down the road others were wildcamping as well.

name: Bicaz
description: Grass area at shore of lake bicaz, lots of locals camping and fishing on the weekend.

name: Down by the river
description:
This could be a dream spot if there wasn’t so much garbage around. But anyways, if you can look over this you can spend a night here.
Not far from the highway, good stop if you’re heading to Danube delta.

name: Camping Curtea Larga
description:
Very nice campsite. Close to historic cities and nature. Well kept grass field surrounded by trees for shade.
Cleanest facilities we've seen in a long time travelling Eastern Europe and Turkey.
Fire pit and bbq free to use, including wood.
Nice owner who speaks good English. 
We paid 60 lei for 2 persons and car/tent.

name: Vadu beach Cherhanaua Bosoanca
description: You must camp at minimum 150m away from the sea.

name: Camping 2 Mai
description: You can find this camping also on internet. Great view, very close to the sea..

name: Pension Gaina
description: You can ask the owner to camp in garden.

name: offRoadventure
description: Great campsite for 4x4 overlanders and off road vehicles. With Wifi and electricity. Good clean showers and toilets. only accessible by 4x4 or off road vehicle. Run by a Dutch guy named Bauke. He can also advise you on 4x4 trips and he can offer them as well.

name: Bush camp near Molid
description: Soon as you cross the bridge coming from the west you turn right. Drive for about a km and there you can do a bush camp. You can also go further down the road. To be clear, call on the south side of the river.  Have a look what the situation is with the level of the river. And if you don't get surprised at night due to rain in the mountains.

name: At the river Mures
description:
Even better than the other one further up the track.
By the river
Some shadow.

name: Place between slighty frequented road and river
description:
A nice spot at the river. Perfect to get yourself a shower and stay over night. Place for a few cars.
4x4 not needed when dry. A little ground clearance required as road has a little ramp to reach the street. Spot quite close to the street but covered with trees.

name: Zori Camping
description: Great and fairly new spot in a small village. Ten pitches on grass with electricity. Very well maintained. Shared cooking area in an old barn, hammocks, fireplace by the river,… All in all just beautiful, quiet and clean.

name: Parking lot in the mountains
description: Simple parking for day hikes, some vendors during the day, quiet at night. You can get a nice Crepes with Nutella at 9pm :) Great for a hike in the early morning. Other than that nothing special.

name: Villa Hermania
description: Really nice spot in the mountains. There is an apartment building but you can camp in the backyard. Clean facilities, nice owners, you can have served dinner if you fancy and they can book tours for you in advance.

name: Dubova
description: Just a flat, secluded and quiet spot in the rocky river bank. You take the dirt road up the hill after Decebal rock and after a few kilometers you turn left.

name: Densus Church
description: There is some public space adjacent to the north fence of the church. Since around the church building are some graves, be aware that the spot is a bit… particular.

name: Casuta din Poveste
description: Very beautiful restaurant next to the main road. There is a fantastic yard by the river.

name: Near the monastary Slanic
description: Quiet spot next to the gravel road. Well shaded while the truck’s solar is catching sun. Take the gravel road to the monastery and you will find it. 4G 50%

name: Moara Medievala Valea Agrbiciului
description: Just 2.5 kms off the main road you can find this big grassland. Plenty of space for camping even for big rigs. There’s, as well,  a small creek on the side. You can reach it via a good dirt road.

name: Rimetea
description: Drive 200 meters past Rimetea village towards the rocky hills and you’ll find plenty of space for wild camping. The dirt road uphill is a bit steep so maybe have a look on foot before driving up. There’s space for turning around in case you won’t like the spot.

name: Water on the road
description: Just a water point on the side of the dirt road

name: Raul Negru
description: The park is closed and completely rundown, but it’s a good place for the night, maybe more. If you have a 4x4 and good clearance, you can pass the big stone through the left and park your vehicle in the park with lots of shade.

name: Lotru
description: A beautiful, flat, very quiet place by Lotru creek. Just 2.8 kilometers off the main road. (Attention: on the way there’s a steep uphill with a couple of bumps).

name: Spot at the river
description:
Nice flat area directly between the road and the river with a little fire pit.
Should be accessible by car when dry.

name: Next to the bear park
description:
Zărnești is a reserve for dancing bears.  It is very worthwhile to go there, especially since the castle Bran (Dracula) is very close.

a quiet, very nice place to sleep right next to the Bear Park.

name: Nou Român
description: A grass field on the hillside with amazing views of Fagaras mountains and Olt river. It’s just 200 meters off the main road but 4x4 might be needed.

name: Football playground
description:
You can use this big flat shadow place too. 
Enjoy the life and please pick up trash (even it’s not yours!)

name: Camping next culture house
description: Nice silent place, with a lot of space but not shadow. Toilets and shower ok. There is a kitchen too. 5€ per person

name: Lacul Rosu
description: Just 3.6 kms off the main road you can find a very quiet area, and wild camp next to the small creek. All we heard was cow bells and the running water. The spot is almost at the end of the dirt road, and from there you can take the blue stripe path up the hill. There’s space even for big rigs and the area is very clean. There’s no cell service.

name: Auf der Alm between cows
description: On the mountain between cows and horses. It was so quiet

name: River Campside at the Border
description: Directly after the border there is a small river where there isbplenty of space to camp. In the evening sheep may pass by and in the morning you could see fishermen in the distance. The border police guided us to this place and we could call them whenever we have a problem. Also a bridge for people is there, which is totally broken, but used by the locals. Brave ones can cross it

name: Green Gras Hillside
description: Right next to the main street a nice grass hillspot. There is nobody and you can rest for one night

name: Castle View Camping
description: We took a side street next to the castle. You have to cross a small wooden bridge. The gravel road leads to a house. You can camp on the side under a big lonely tree.

name: PORT BECHET
description: FERRY from Bechet/Roumania to Oryahovo (Bulgarie). We payes 13.-€ for10.to. Truck/ Camper!

name: Auto Florin Mechanic
description: Professional workshop which can help with any issue. Many positive opinions on google - well earned.

name: La Dolce Vita
description: Pretty good and cheap food! One of the best pizza I had in a while. If you are passing by just make a quick stop here. The pizza to go takes about 10 mins and it was delicious.

name: Valea Iasului
description: Drinking water spring. Well used by locals.

name: Washeria
description: Well organized self service laundromat. Located in the center of the city, difficult to find a parking place nearby for a camper.

name: Parking in Tulcea
description: free parkingspace in the city, 15minutes by feet to the harbour

name: Sea Side Camping Place
description: Next to the river a small camping place. Sometimes fisherman pass by

name: Kajak Rental
description:
A young couple trys to establish a kajak rental service. currently they only have one boat and we were the first customers but the area is wonderful and definitly worth it.
Ask at the pension Califar for kayak rental

name: Poian at River Caşin
description: a nice overnight spot on a meadow near small river. access by the nearby road 11B over a short gravel road. left side before the bridge. there is closed barrier on the other side of the bridge. some fishing men may be in the nearby area. very calm in the night.

name: Ograda
description:
Really good food for a really good price. Friendly stuff and this great deal in the middle of Brasov! If you spent some time in Brasov check the place out. 
We had the bread spread and had to order extra bread two time cause it was so much food. And the rips a delicious and tender. 
Mains between 28 and 60 lei beers from 9 to 18 lei.

name: Vintu de Jos
description: Fresh drinking water. Only little parking space.

name: Hill Plateau
description: A hill plateau with a stunning view. 5km from the highway. great place to stay overnight.

name: Near Nationalpark next to to river
description: A small camping ground with tables to eat, a small stream of fresh water and fire places

name: On the hill
description:
Nice place, near the road DN1C. Green medow on top of the hill. Nice view.
Perfect place for one night.

name: Idyllic spot right next to the river
description: Flat place on gravel next to nice little river. Close to the road, but invisible and not much traffic. No shade. OK cell reception.

name: La doichita
description:
It’s a wonderful spot with a super nice old lady (Doichita), she has bungalow. It’s not full of facilities but the place worth a stop. She can cook for you.
If you like quite countryside life, with animals and nature, this is your place 
The road to get in it is gravel, but you can manage with a normal car.

Number of Doichita’s daughter (Adriana)
0040733660441

name: Into the woods
description: In the woods. No dogs. No mosquito. No people. No trash

name: Next to the river
description:
Flat place next to the river and next to dirtroads. If you come from the village Hobita, there is a small park with sculptures where some locals do picnic as well. We crossed the river to the other side. Road goes through the river, but the water was not really deep. There is a small bridge as well, where you can cross with a small motorcycle or bicycle. Another possibility is to come from the other side (Road 672, Bradiceni). No rubbish around, please keep it clean! 
In the evening there was one car and some people walking around, but no one bothered us.

name: Bulgaria-Romania
description:
Border crossing BG - RO - BG
You have to pay a toll for using the bridge, but only for a car or bigger. Have a look at the pictures for prices. 
For crossing Romania, they just asked for passport and vehicle documents. Same for other direction. 
Waiting time depends on season. 
You need to buy a vignette for Bulgaria and Romania.

name: Lake Fânațe - fishing lake where you can also camp
description: Fishing lake where you can also camp and it also has Bungalows. Large place with grass and place to cook- barbeque. facebook adress: ; 4 eur / tent, 20 eur / bungalow. Owner friendly

name: Nomad Eco-Village
description: Amazing setting with different types of Glamping spaces. Food available, not cheap but unique. Near Bran and Dracula's Castle.

name: Pensiunea Casa Sibianului
description: inexpensive clean accomodation, 5 minute walk from the old town of Sibiu. the gateway to the Transalpina. Stunning town well with a visit. The Pension has very secure parking for motorcycles. Lovely people as well!

name: Biker Friendly Accomodation -Garsoniera Medieval
description: Best location in Brasov for bikes and to stay. It's located in the historic district and has a huge courtyard perfect for housing bikes. The location is wonderful, really quiet and the pricing is some of the cheapest you'll find in the area. Exceptionally clean, friendly host and has plenty of rooms to stay in. Located at 24 Michael Weiss

name: camping poiania soarelui
description: grassy nice campgroud surrounded by forests.you have all.covered kitchen,grillplace.

name: Langa Focsani
description:
Translation:It's a plain area, corn grows here, animals are rabbits and deer

E zona de campie, aici cresc porumb, animale sunt iepuri si caprioare

name: Langa manastirea Lepșa
description: Beautiful place, near mini river, near Lepsa Monastery

name: nemo
description: a fine place directly on the danube.grassy.big view.good restaurant.nice people.

name: no name
description: grassy place out of all.windy,no shelter but exeptonal view around

name: Cliffside
description: MODERATOR NOTE: 'Kein Camping Verbotsschild', No camping prohibition signs.

name: Parc Camping Rulote
description: Brand new camping beside the river with clean bathrooms and hot showers!!!

name: Pensuine Restaurant
description:
We ate here sea foot, pasta and pizza for 6, drunk and payed around 50€. One portion of each was big enough as it’s possible to share for children. Super friendly stuff.
Absolutely recommended!

name: Ograda
description: Here you can find water next to little market where you also can park next by.

name: Capituleren Catherina
description: Nice house with 6 guestsrooms. Family is very helpful. There is an inside kitchen you can use. Beatifull garden where you can put your bikes and motorbikes very safely.

name: By the Danube river
description: Nice and cosy place where locals come for fishing and camping. You can buy food and water in the village.

name: aqua apartman service auto
description:
nice appartement and very friendly owners. They are also running a garage. 
Perfect place to start/end the bordercrossing. Supermarket across the street. good pizza around the corner.

name: Top camping 125
description:
Quiet place in Bucovina segment of Via  Transilvanica  .
 This location is  It's equipped with 4 RV campers ,water, electricity ,and wiled  tent sites

name: Camping Delta
description:
Small and clean campsite with all facilities included. At three minutes away from the lake Murighiol, restaurants and supermarket.
The owner offers spectacular boat tours in the Danube Delta.

name: Bridge
description: A very nice place to stay next to a forest. There are no services. The way to the place it’s rough. Preferably, you have a 4X4. Please take your garbage away! During the day, there is some noise from the bridge, but during the night it’s quiet. From the fishermen you can buy fresh fish.

name: Parcul Sub Arini
description: We had been here for two nights. All people were friendly and nobody complained about us. There are toilets, a room for mothers with children, a place to make sports, a playground, a great park to enjoy peace and tranquillity and there’s also  potable water at the place where the sport facilities are. Nicest place in the city to stay. Also, isn’t far away from the old town; 15 minutes to walk with the kids.

name: Peco station
description: We were a little lost in mountains and we found this station in small town. Friendly men to help us, you can pay by card.

name: Riverside
description: On the right of the main road we saw a small path and discovered a river and a fire place. Nice place to sleep, quiet at night. Lot of mint plants. Some mosquitoes but not much.

name: Roadside
description: Free parking along the road. 15 minutes walking to city center.

name: Martinesti lakes
description:
Follow the road for Martinesti town and go straight to the 3rd lake.

You will find a great place to sleep with nice view. So quiet, people friendly.

name: Lakeside
description:
Beautiful lake near to Medias. Lot of fishermen and locals campers.
Big and free grass area, lake nice to swim (very hot in July).

name: Grassy Area
description:
Large grassy area near horses and a river.
Fire place, flat.

name: Bran Castle parking
description:
Big parking near to Bran Castle. 5 lei/hour
OK for big rigs

name: Vodita Monastery
description:
Big and flat parking of Vodatia Monastery. Nice monastery, small river nearby.  OK for big rigs even if the access isn't big. Some wild dogs but friendly.
Quiet at night. You can visit the wood church.
.....
Grand parking plat en gravillons au Monastère Vodatia. Le chemin d'accès est assez étroit mais un camping car peut passer. Quelques chiens errants mais gentils, même avec notre chien. Rivière à proximité.
Vous pouvez visiter l'église en bois, très jolie. Gratuit.

name: Pizzeria Vesuvo
description: Nice pizzeria. 30 lei for big pizza, friendly owner. Speaks English.

name: Lacul Tineretului
description: We’ve parked here at least 3 nights. Jandarmeri parked next to us; they didn’t sent us away. A great park to enjoy the time and start sightseeing. In the Park are toilets and drink water. During the day there are lots of cars to park here for the children fun park, but in the night it’s quiet. At the weekend there are some events which means loud music until midnight. We enjoyed this time here very much.

name: Hanul Pintea Haiducu
description: This place is an inn (didn't stay here, only ate) with restaurant, where the trout is served fresh from the pond on-site. Decent prices and plenty of parking spaces

name: spring fountain
description: Fresh spring water. Not great parking. The road isn't very busy in the early evening.

name: Spring
description: Spring on the side of the road maintained by the locals with good water to drink.

name: Spring
description: Natural spring with good water do drink, very close to the main road.

name: Pitesti local beach
description: local beach with a nice place for a tent or a van.

name: Camping Gradina Ioanei
description: New campground. Super nice place with trees and shadow. Fishpond in the middle. Hammocks, tables, fireplace provided. Bathroom is new and clean! Owners are superfriendly and naturelovers. Friendly dogs running around.

name: Doftana
description: Near little river, quite, pet friendly, but near is pension with dogs.

name: Space for a couple of cars and tents by a little river
description: Easy to get since it's right by the main road leading to the Moldovan border. The access is through a narrow path between the river and a potato field that finishes right by a space used by fishermen. There were some vans when I arrived.

name: Pensiunea Discordia
description: Clean private room with shower. Book through Booking.com for RON80. A bit warm during summer. There is a restaurant downstairs selling delicious pizza. A big parking space inside the pension area, but not sure if the front gate is locked or not at night. Motorbikes kept inside locked garage.

name: By the river
description: Right by the river there are plenty of spots to pitch the tent or park. The area is very quiet and beautiful. There's a new bridge to cross the river. Good shadow and nice water.

name: Grassland
description: Coming from the main road you'll see a path leading to the creek. There are some spots to camp by the path. We kept a little further and found this grassland with plenty flat ground for pitching your tent.

name: Carmen
description: On Tranfarasagatan. After the tunnel, further down. A few shops with Meat and cheese on the opposite site. The locals use the water. And it tastes really good

name: Tara Nomada Camping and Hostel
description:
A very nice fairly small camp site and hostel in the middle of a small Romanian village, very helpful owners and drinking water on tap.

An incredibly peaceful spot with good amenities and clean showers / loos

name: Open water source with bucket
description: Local water source with bucket. Enough water and clean.

name: Private Land
description:
In high season (summer) it’s the only “quiet” option in the valley. All other official campsites are extremely crowded.
Here we found some peace.

It’s a private meadow, established as an improvised camping by the owner (which comes at evening to collect the cash. We paid 35 for 3+tent).

The site offers some shade, best at mornings or evening (not much mercy at noon… just a few trees surely occupied by others in Summer). 
There is a water spring in the land and pit toilets… Nothing else.
Can work for big rig also.

It’s next to the road but it’s not a main road and therefore quiet at night.

name: Serbia Romania a Border
description:
Entering Serbia on Italian passport and Emirates carnet de passage.

Romania side 5 mins. No checks.
Serbia side took sometime to explain them what was the carnet de passage…
They were not sure what to do with it… not very good English either didn’t help…

After 15 mins of gestures talking they let us enter.

Stamped only passports.

name: Next to river
description: Small place for a few cars. Down from the road so less noise. Flat area with rocks. Not ideal for tents. Small stream of water to play in. Road is not busy. No cars at night.

name: Monastery Borșa Pietroasa
description:
Overnight stay on the new parking area at the monastery. There is a new building in construction (July 2022) which accommodates toilets as well.
The parking area is quiet but also used for parking by hikers starting from here. A nice view over Borsa. The parking area was unsealed in July 2022 but it will probably change when the new building ist finished. You can visit the monastery as well.  A donation of a couple of RON is welcome but not necessary.

name: Monastery Borsa Pietroasa
description: Parking area at the monastery suitable for overnight stay. The building (under construction in July 2022) at the parking area accommodates toilets. The parking area is used by hikers starting their tours from here. But very quiet in the night. A nice viewpoint over Borsa. A narrow sealed street from the Borsa city centre ca. 5 km to drive.

name: Large area in valley
description: Allowed camping area with many spots, including fire pits, benches and tables. Probably busy with locals during high season weekends.

name: Apartment Roza
description: Great parking for motorcycles inside gated courtyard.  2 rooms, 2 bed and 5 bed. Kitchen etc. Short walk to Carrefour and bus ride to old town center. Definitely recommended.

name: Vila Alfredo
description: Recommended. Clean and comfortable rooms, good parking for motorcycles. Close to town centre

name: La stermin
description: Very nice hostel with nice owner and great food

name: camping het zwaluwnest
description: small family run campsite. nice toilets and shower. good WiFi. the owners speak a bit of English, German and Dutch

name: Leaf forest
description: High spot in the middle of a forest. Extremely quiet. You won't disturb anyone.

name: spot with great view uphill
description:
nice spot with a good view over the hills, little noise from the road below but nothing major.
plenty of room for big rigs, but the last bit up is quite steep with low hanging branches.
Good 4G Phone reception.

name: Hidden and quiet
description: Right before entering the bridge, there's a dirt path to get to the creek. I you continue a little through it you'll find some flat areas to pitch the tent or parking. It's quiet and you hidden from the road. ok for a night.

name: DAScamping
description: A family-run campsite with bungalows, tents also possible. Basic but pristine facilities. No Wi-Fi. Quiet surroundings. Very friendly, English speaking owners.

name: nice place at the river
description:
20m from the shore. Not too much rubbish. Enough shade due to high trees. 
Border police came, checked our passports and welcomed us. 

Big rig (we are 8m long and 3,2m high) are no problem. You need a bit clearance and maybe 4x4 when rainy.

name: Riverbeach
description:
informal barbecue and fishing spots with fireplaces and lots of waste but a nice beach and shadow.
we just burned the waste in our bonfire and then it was nice.

name: Stealth Canyon
description: This is a quiet spot tucked into a canyon along a small river. It is just off the road, but is completely hidden from view. The track down is just passed the tunnel on the right hand side. It is steep and narrow, ok for some motorcycles, but anything too large would stay up on the road. A few km down the road to the west is a picnic/shelter spot. That would be a better place for vehicles/big rigs.

name: The Beech
description: Large camp area off the road and next to the river. It is somewhat visible from the road but not much traffic while we were here. Some fire pits, no trash around. Please keep it clean.

name: River Jiu
description: A nice Spot direct a the river Jiu, nice for swimming and relax

name: nice view on Donau
description: nice view an Donau River and sandy beach

name: Riverside
description: A wild camping place close to the Transfagarasan Road in Cartisoara. A meadow by a small river. Nice and quiet. The possibility of making a fire. Clear water in the river.

name: Transursoaia nice few
description:
Some flat spots along the gravelroad with great few over lakes and mountains. It is also possible to drive down the road to the lake, there is also a place for one car.
We prefered the nice view.

name: the secret garden
description: A big campsite with a pool, kitchen, clean toilets and showers. Lots of trees, so easy to find a place in a shadow. you can also relax in a hammock. I had the whole place to myself. the owner is very friendly and even invited me for a barbecue. the price is 40 lei per tent + 20 Lei per person

name: By the river
description: Coming down from the main road you take a trail to the river. There's plenty space for pitching tents or parking. Quiet during the night and some local people with cows came by during the day.

name: Hilltop
description: A place for wild camping on the top of a hill among birch trees.  At the top, there is space for four cars.  Beautiful views around, quiet and peaceful surroundings.  Access only by 4x4.

name: Cabana Mocan
description: Cozy guesthouse tucked into a nice little mountain village. We paid 100RON for a double room with private bathroom, and amazing mountain view. I believe there are also bunk rooms for a cheaper price. Meals can be provided for a reasonable cost. We paid 130RON for dinner, breakfast and multiple coffees for two people. Moto parking in the gated yard. There is a small hike to a waterfall from the guesthouse. Highly recommend!

name: Outside forest path
description:
Stunning view!
4x4 needed!
Only one car
Away from the forest road

name: Wild camp spot in the forest
description: Wild camp spot in the forest, near the river. There is flat grass to pitch a tent and some fire pits.  You can park the car on the side of the road or if 4x4 drive drive in to be more hidden. The dirt road is good quality and was no problem to drive even after the rain. 3-4 cars passed by in the evening.

name: Nomad beach Năvodari
description: Beautiful place for camping near the beach and restaurant.

name: Clover Creek
description: Nice spot to pitch the tent beside a small river. The road is visible, but very little traffic. Good for motos or bikes, vehicles will need to park 30m away.

name: Axm Service
description: Theres no signboard outside the premise but you can check the picture attached here. Open Monday to Saturday, 8am - 6pm. Repair cars, vans & motorbikes. The mechanic speaks English. Owner is Mihai, +40 732103897

name: Meadow
description: Calm and nice place, small creek, plenty of firewood.  Big rig friendly, but don't use the bridge in the north. It's limited to 5t and 3m. there are two other bridges in west and east.

name: Wild Camping near Lake
description: Nice quiet place on the lakeside. Little bit rubbish from daypeople. But an amazing view. Entry trough gravel / mud road, not suitable for heavy trucks over 7.5 Ton.

name: Near hiking trail
description:
Quiet and lonely wild camp near to hiking trail. River and firepit on site. There are also other campsites like this one a few hundred meters before. Perfect for hiking to the summit of Romania, Moldoveanu.
Only disadvantage: we had to use a track which was signed as forbidden, because of the bears apparently. We decided to go anyway, and we met locals, other campers and forest officers. It seems to be not at all a problem to come here.

name: Georgenescu
description:
Robinet in the city, you can fill up with a jerry can but not easy otherwise because you can only park in front. Not perfect but hard to find something else in the area.
Luckily we found a parking place at 10m in front of the laboratory (by the way, PCR and antigenic tests available, don't come too late at noon). 
Kaufland at 5 minuts too.

name: River camp
description:
Grassy and flat big space near to a river. Possible to wash dishes in the water but not sure about other uses. You can stay under the nearby trees for shade. We stayed only for the day (waiting for PCR results to go to Ukraine). We saw only 2 people who walked with their dogs but I think no problem for the night. Access by a little dirty road suitable for all (only not RV probably). Some garbage here.
4G and pit fire on site.

name: Water point
description: There is a water tap at the toilet block at the rest area

name: Soccer stadium in Snagov
description: Long parking area beside the stadium.  4G reception, porta potties and rubbish bins. Not much else but quiet at night.  We found two open WiFi networks too. Good overnight stop before hitting the big city.

name: Wild bushes on a meadow
description: If you pass the meadow there are some bushes or even a forest which can hide a tent, motorbike, or maybe even a rig. River nearby, but not clean. No people around, stayed for one night.

name: Express Wash
description: Self serve laundry.  Machine to buy tokens (bills only). Buy 3 for the washer,  2 for the dryer.  Tokens are 5 RON each.  The washer takes 35 minutes and is a good size. The dryer takes 20 minutes and is big. Parking on the street and in a small lot out front.  Can be busy on the street but we were the only ones at Laundry.  Could be open 24 hours as no signs posted with the hours

name: Spot between lake and fields
description: Nice spot near the lake, just 200m away from the road. Super silent and a nice view. Also a nice spot to des the stars.

name: Spalatorie Self-Service
description:
Washing machine with included detergent 20 lei 
Washing machine without detergent 15 lei 

Dryer 10 lei

name: wild camp
description: beautiful small place in forest, not far away from street, good for Camper with rooftent

name: meadow near river
description: one of our best places. Meadow near clean river .

name: Free campside
description:
campside with 3 wooden hoods for free. On the other side of the street is the house of the owner. Place yourself and later he will visit you. 
He has a donation-box at his house...you give donation for campside. 
Beautiful nature around, very calm, very friendly owner. You can take shower at his house if you need.

name: Hwy 705A
description: official free campsite and picnic place. 300 meters away from campground, hotel and restaurant.

name: spring
description: natural spring water at parking next to road

name: meadow near 10 houses.
description: one meadow at roadside, one meadow 20 Meter further down to small town

name: Karpaten Erwin
description: small campground next to clean river, owner speak german, englisch and french. He can give you lot of tips what to do in Ariseni NP. We paid 75 lei incl. electricity. The bridge is for heavy cars till 8 to...I ask Erwin about the bridge. The 2 dogs are very friendly.

name: by the lake
description: Calm place to rest next to the lake, some cars passing during the day, open field. Sheeps  around.

name: Cismea
description: Natural spring / Drinkable - izvor natural - apa este potabila

name: National Museum of agriculture
description: Really nice museum about the history of agriculture in Romania. Lots of original  agricultural objects. There are also two old houses that show you how people used to live (and sometimes still do). All the texts are in Romanian, but there was this lovely lady who spoke English quite well, who guided us through the whole museum. A lovely experience. And the entrance is only 5 lei p.p.!

name: Top of the hill
description: Place on top the mountains, easily accessible and very quiet at night. Just drive around 200 meters on the dirt road and park, relatively flat.

name: Spring water tap
description: Fresh water from natural spring. Everyone is welcome!

name: wild camp near novat river
description:
spot for one car near the river very clean around and no facilities or signal hear.
on the way hear need to cross through the river near the "novat" train station and then crossing the rails few times. there is wood harvesting around so they do some noise but other then that is really quite hear.

name: Above Monastery Sinca Veche
description: Great Spot for Overnight. very level up by the Antennas on the gravel parking lot. very quiet.

name: DMS4X4
description: Really nice guys, came here 2 times. The first time for some regular maintenance, and we found some more work that needs to be done. So they ordered the parts and I came back for the last work on the landcruiser. We did all kind of bushes, shock absorbers replacement and an inlet manifold gasket. I would really recommend these guys! Keep up the good work!

name: Daams
description: Camping located in the middle of the forest.i pay 10 euro.Please call the phone number +400765430382

name: Heaven Camping
description:
Nice campsite near Bran, Zarnesti and the mountains on all sides (amazing view!). Brand new bathrooms, very clean. Sunny sites with electricity and water, but you can also camp on the other side without electricity and water where there’s trees. In the back, there is a barbecue zone with sink, fridge and extra gas stove. Also a bistro bar (which wasn’t open as we were here off season) with a really nice terrace in the orchards. A trampoline and some swings for the kids. 
Cost is including everything (so if you camp on the other field you will still pay the price including electricity and water). Tent was for us free, but that was because we came with a van and a tent. The van was 35. Then per person 30lei. But actual prices are listed on the website: https://heavencampingbran.com/

Just one awareness point for when it has rained before: it’s all grass and it gets quite soggy. Both us and the only other camper that day got stuck in the field. We managed to get out with our leveling blocks.

name: Enjoy
description: 1300m high on top of the mountain. Beautifull view. Cool place to overnight. 4x4 Off road vehicle. Any kind of Camper is an absolut No Go.

name: Enjoy 2
description: Over 1300m perfect spot for overnight. Really cool view around. 4x4 Off road vehicle. Any kind of Camper is an Absolute No Go.

name: meadow
description: very nice meadow between small town and river.

name: Medusa Camping
description: Mid-size Campground between houses. Close to the seashore. At the moment, works in progress.

name: Quiet place near Brasov
description: It is forbidden to drive with trucks into the city center of  Brasov. This place is a good parking space to drive from here with Uber to the Oldtown. Good for one or two nights. But this place is nothing special.

name: Mocanita Moldovit (Steam train ride)
description:
Here you can ride with an small old steam train, from Moldovița to Argel and back. There is a 40 min break in Argel, to buy some food. The whole event takes around 3h. You can do some reservation online, but you have to pay cash on the event day.

Check the official webside: https://mocanitamoldovita.com/
Price was 50 RON p.P.

name: Moldovița river camping
description: Free space at the river,not the nicest place, but the only one we found. Good if you want to do the narrow gauge line (small steam train) ride on the next day.

name: Moldovita Monastery
description:
One of the seven Moldavian monasteries included in the UNESCO World Heritage List in 1993.  Interior and exterior walls were decorated with paintings. 

10 RON p.P.
 (Images are from Wikipedia).

name: River side
description: Little park up but big enough for 4-5 vehicles.

name: Next to road parking with a view
description: Just at the end of the tarmac there are plenty of possibilities for parking next to the road or even wilder. There is a big plateau overlooking the city of Cluj-Napoca where you can camp almost anywhere. Sometimes in the evening young people come to see the view so take that into account but usually everybody mind their own business. If you take the dirt road and continue about 2 km there are also lots of camping places next to forests (but don't do it too close to the animal farms).

name: Near Tapia
description: Just off the tarmac road (opposite the drinking water fountain) is a dirt track. This track is hard and free draining, even in heavy rain. Suitable for all vehicles. We spent a very peaceful night here and felt totally safe

name: Camping Transylvania Velo Camp
description: Nice small camping with 2 hot showers and 2 toilets, all very clean. Also open for RV camping

name: Remetea
description: clean drinkable water taste nice locals use it. place for filling bottles

name: A G P camping
description:
400 Vaciorog
New 2021 astablished camper place. Has everything a traveler needs.
open 15/4 to 15/10

name: Suspension Bridge
description: Nice and small road to this place. Near the river.

name: Bearriver
description: Nice place to be. You have to drive though a small river. In the night, wild animals will come to drink.

name: Kevin Auto Service
description:
Super equipped workshop, top staff and the boss also speaks some English and German.

Our gearbox had to go down because a thread was torn out. We came immediately although the hall was full!

And we were even invited to lunch.

Hospitable as you know it from Romania

name: open space next to river / woods
description:
great spot.
next to river.
just out of a small town.
hike trail start here.
there is a cave.
in town there is a rafting compagnie.


but there is on the other side of the river a railway track, trains pass by and are noisy.

good for fishing.
hiking.

name: Camping Christina
description: Parking on a grass  in a big garden. ChristIna is a very friendly person. She charges for a night, two persons and a camper without electricity: 60 Leu. It is a good place to make trips to different monasterys.

name: truck stop
description:
Very noisy truck stop.
Toilet and water.
Secured by camera so you are safe.

But really noisy at night by the cars drive by on the highway.

Good for an overnight stop on the way to the Black Sea

name: parking next to beach
description:
free parking direct next to beach.
between two big hotels.
bussy in the day.
in the weekend cars drive by in the evening but quit at night.

wierd spot.
becourse you are in the center of a tourist area.

name: Camping Balta Costin
description: Many places on grass. Very friendly owner. There ist a pond where you can fish. Clean sanitary facilities.

name: Forrest next to Peles Castle
description:
It’s a road that leads into the forest. 
We parked here to visit the Peles Castle. There is a short trail through the woods. No one seemed bothered. 

Just a night stop. Isn't leveled. In the morning working men made noise …

name: Blu Wash Laundry
description:
Small but very clean selfservice laundry shop. 
Three washing machines and dryers..

name: Wide meadow next to a river
description: It’s a wide meadow with plenty options to stay. Right next to a river

name: Pecica
description:
Good place for a calm stop over. Very quiet.
Perfect for a stop after crossing the Hungarian border.

name: Balta cu tei
description:
Balta cu tei is a large campground situated between mountains and has a pond near it. There are many spots to pitch a tent. The land is flat so it’s good for tents. You can park your car / bike near your tent too. There is also enough room for vans and trailers.
There are grills, a very well-equipped kitchen, there is a fridge and a freezer.
The bathrooms and showers are very clean, too. The water is heated by solar water heaters so very early in the morning the water might be a bit colder, but remains warm until evening.
The place is lit during the night so you don’t need your own lights.
Seems fun for kids also. There’s a trampoline, a swing and a hammock.
Some tent spots also have shade because of some nice trees.
The place is dog-friendly too.

Price / person / day: 30 RON (5 EUR)
No car or motorcycle fees

name: At the river Danube
description:
Gravel parking lot, no infrastructure, some fishermen.
Nice views.

name: Strategica
description: On a green hill and close to the track. Awesome views to the lake at North and the mountains in the South. There is service for mobile data.

name: Hunedoara
description:
Simple street parking , not far away of the famous castle.
At night time less traffic noise.

name: Donau
description:
Quiet spot for 2-3 rigs directly on the banks of the river Danube
-------------
Ruhiger Platz für 2 bis 3 Fahrzeuge am Donau Ufer,

name: Turda
description:
Beside of the town & close to a park. 
Good for a night stop after visiting the salina.

name: Self Service laundry
description:
Nice self-service laundry. 
15 lei for a 10kg machine, 20 lei for a 14 kg machine. 
20 minutes dryer - 20 lei. 
10 minutes dryer - 10 lei.

name: Next to the river
description:
Nice place to stay for a night. 
Next to the river. Sometimes the train comes by, but it was ok!

name: Bumbata - Leova RO/MD Border
description:
New border crossing point on Romanian-Moldovan border. Less traffic. Floating bridge allowed for vehicles up to 3.5t. 
Both Romanian and Moldovan customs and immigration done in less than 20 minutes.
Opened 8 am - 8 pm EET/EEST.

name: Camping Aquaris
description:
Full camping ground, 10 min walking distance to the historic town Schäßburg.
Car & 2 people: 150 Lai

name: Camping Robinson Country Club
description: Nice campground with clean facilities, restaurants and a pool. Very friendly staff!

name: Gravel Parking Seven Leader Canyon
description:
Nothing special, just a free area beside the street in opposite of a small church.
No noise at night, sometimes a trains run in a far distance.

It is a good parking spot for the hiking tour, too. Uphill there are no parking areas for big rigs.

name: Parking Peles
description: Private Hotel parking, not really allowed here, but if you ask, you may stay here for one night.

name: Nice spot in the River Timisoara
description: A lot of space, spots on the Meadow near the River , at weekends some locals come to party.

name: Bukarest City
description:
Parking lot near museum and small park. Very save area and not noisy at night.
Most of the area you have to pay from 0800 - 2000 . You can pay by Bukarest- Parking App.
We parked in a small part without blue lines and that is for free!!!

name: Trajans Monument
description:
Quite place. In front of the ancient site. You can use toiletts/restrooms at the ticket shop.
At night there are spots in service.

name: Moon Beach
description:
Close to the sea, beside a small creek. You don‘t need 4x4.
We stayed 2 nights. No problems on a weekend in high saison.

name: Zanesti
description: Flat area along a forest track and a river. Quiet and nice place. Suitable for 2 rigs .

name: Sibiel Camper
description: Nice place, 18 km from Sibiu. It is in the village of Sibiel, just behind the village church. We are a new campsite. We have 10 camping places, but the yard has 6800 square meters. I hope you will visit us soon!

name: Detunata Camping and Pension
description:
Beautiful meadow with a covered barbecue area. Firewood, sinks, shower and toilet. Very clean and good restaurant.
Camping: 2 pers. and camper 60 leu
Highly recommended

Schöne Wiese mit überdachtem Grillplatz. Feuerholz, Spülen,Dusche und WC. Sehr sauber und gutes Restaurant.
Camping: 2 Pers.und Camper 60 Leu
Sehr empfehlenswert

name: Restaurant/Pension mit Campmöglichkeit
description:
Restaurant with possibility of camping. Wonderful view of the lake. Clean toilet and warm shower. Terrace. We paid 10 euros for a camper and 2 people.

Restaurant mit Campmöglichkeit. Wunderbarer Blick auf den See. Saubere Toilette und warme Dusche. Terrasse. Wir bezahlten  10 Euro für Camper und 2 Personen.

name: Hacienda Camping
description:
Nice, small camping, fells like family run. Close to the beach.
Smalls dogs are allowed.
Entrace is only for rigs lower than 3,50 m.
We paid for a truck camper & 2 person: 105 Lei = 21€.

name: Hotel Wanderer
description: The hotel is beautiful, clean, and has a nice atmosphere and free private parking outside (no hight limitation). We stayed here for 300 Lei ~ 60 euro for two people including breakfast. We also enjoyed our diner at the restaurant, the food was very tasteful and the service was excellent. We were welcomed professionally and very kindly by our host Timi, thank you! She made us feel very welcome and was a great representation for Sighişoara and the hotel.

name: Calaretii
description:
good camp, clean toilet and shower, 
shadow, nice view into the montains. 100 ron  for 2 Person with camper

name: Oaks Plateau
description: A huge clearing with lots of areas to camp. There are trees for shade, fire pits, and some picnic tables throughout the field. We found a level spot near a large Oak tree. Very quiet at night. The road leading to the clearing is through a forest and potholed. No need for 4x4, any size vehicle should be OK.

name: Wild beach somewhere
description:
Along the track you will find tousends of camp spots. 100 Meters to your neighbour. 
We stayed two nights in high saison.

name: Kamping nad rzeka
description: Campsite close to the river, clean, fresh water.

name: Entrance
description: Offroad entrance to the rocky mountain path

name: in the forest
description: gassy flat area, no mosquitos, really quite in the night

name: Ghermanesti Church
description:
Just a stop for the night after crossing the border of Moldavia.
Quiet at night. On Sunday they start outside praying at 7:30 am!

name: By a creek South of Voronet monastary
description: Green area by a small river. On weekends locals are there. Fire pits exist. Night time was very quiet.

name: Hostel Citadella
description: Quite big, professional and well run hostel with a big private parking. AC in the rooms.

name: Rodnei mountain
description: river side , fore place, table, nice place for a wild camping, river right side

name: Carlibaba
description:
Gravel parking lot. Outside the village beside a ski station. Loneliness in summer time.
Small creek at the parking lot.

name: Lion Rock
description:
Nice place lion rock 
Perfect for amazing pictures and camp

name: Danube Riverside
description:
Close to the border, we found this easily accessible place in the bush, which looks a bit like the Amazonas jungle. This is also the only place where we had a good mobile connection, but driving further there is none.
It was very calm,  just locals came to the beach. The place is hidden, a bit small, but perfect for one car and for being alone. 
Unfortunately, a lot of mosquitos.

There's no 4x4 needed, but of course some gruond clearance as the sandy track is pretty bumpy.

Swimming in the Donau river is possible of course, even though it's not super clear water.

name: Camping Pastravul Sapanta
description:
Great campsite next to the small river. Open field for a lot of cars next to the forest. The owners run also a restaurant on the opposite site of the road.

Clean new bathroom, hot shower

Car with a ground tent- 35 Lei

name: Camping Ursulet
description:
Nice campsite with great views. No music and fire allowed next to the tent, only in designated area as you are in the National park. 

Great starting point for hikes

30 RON for a ground tent

name: Natural Water Source
description: Potable Water source at the street, slow but very clean and cold water

name: Hilltop
description:
Very nice and easy accessible, with a view onto Bran Castle (straight distance 4,3 km).
The dirt track up the hill isn't steep, but sometimes muddy here and there. A huge motorhome made it up the hill - we had to laugh, because it's not a common place for such vehicles ;)
Here and there some ATVs came along, apart from that it was very calm.
Mobile connection has been good (Orange).

name: Grass spot with amazing view next to road
description: Grass spot with shade coverage, incredible view over what feels like whole of Romania. Close to road but quiet

name: Small lake
description: A large meadow by the lake.  Quiet at night, only the frogs in the lake can be heard.  Good LTE coverage.  After rain, access can be difficult for campervans.  4x4 will go in no problem.

name: Cetate Port - at Danube
description: Lot of places along the Danube under trees, swimming in the Danube is possible. Some fishermen.

name: Moto camping Iris
description:
Nice place to start the Transalpina. 
Bath and Shower completely new. 
Safe Parking for Motorbikes. 
Camping 10€ for 1 Tent 1 Person.

Nice coffee in the morning included

brakefast available 

Dinner minimum 4 persons and you need to contact one day in advance. 
Mircea 0766357169

Beds also available (25€ for one person. 30€ for two, 40€ for three)



Nice little village

name: Lake view
description: Belvedere on the lake with incredible views! Take the road to the monastery, beware it is a very steep uphill track!

name: Poligon Sf. Ion
description: Free camp place, without water and electricity, just a place to roast meat.

name: Idyllic Place
description: Nice place at a small kinda lake with lots of birds and other animals. Very calm and easy to access. Mobile connection worked well (Orange)

name: Casa Corina
description: Nice sleeping room and shared bathroom. Friendly owner. Had BBQ with other guests. Vehicles can park being the gate on the property. 100 RON per room.

name: Wild At The River
description: Small flat plateau with lots of greenery. River is barely visible when tide is low. Very calm here, no people around and very easy to access. Mobile connection worked well (Orange). Not the super nice place, but good for one night.

name: Nice spot at the river
description:
Very nice spot next to a small river. No traffic at night, not much during the day. There is a lot of wood for campfires around. A lot of spaces along the river. 
The road leading here is not very easy but should be doable by any car when it did not rain for a few days. It rained two days before we arrived and driving here was no problem with our T4.

name: Flat spot on a hil
description: Flat area on the hill next to gravel road above the town. Good for even 3 cars but only available for 4x4. Very quite place with nice view.

name: Lake Acumularea Fantanale
description: Great place to camp by the lake.  Also accessible for vehicles.  A few fishermen around.  Trees by the lake.  No mosquitoes.  Friendly people.

name: Spot on the meadow
description: Flat area on the meadow close to the forest behind a little hill. Mainly for 4x4. Very nice and quite however from time to time busy road can be heard.

name: Alegria Camping
description: Campsite in Valea Draganului, on the banks of the Dragan river, set back from the county road. We offer camping for caravans and motorhomes, providing: electricity, hot water showers, toilets, domestic water, dishwashing area, waste disposal and high-speed Wi-Fi inter

name: Rustic House Camping
description:
Friendly camping and rooms to rent in a quiet village location. 
Ionelle and Daniel are the perfect hosts and everything is spotless clean.
Camping in their garden surrounded by various types of fruit trees .
Toilet  / shower, outdoor kitchen and sitting area with mosquito net protection...and free coffee from a bean to cup machine  !
Traditional home cooked meals available  on request,  as is breakfast .
Perfect for bikers and only 6km from a quiet ferry border crossing. .ideal for an early morning ferry to Bulgaria avoiding the chaos at Ruse.

name: Border Romania - Moldova
description:
Small borderpost. Long truck waiting time as always, but for cars and motorbikes easy and fast.
They asked for driving license on the Romanian side. 
Buy vignette for Moldova beforehand online.

name: Beside Danube
description: a Flat  wide area along the river. very quiet and a nice sundown

name: Near Zambrita lake
description:
grass field between the path and the lake. The lake seems polluted so I do not recommend using the water. the locals come to fish. no one at night, it was really quiet, no light or noise pollution. slightly sloping ground

access is from a pebble path, suitable for motorhome. the path can be narrow at times.

Covered by 4G

name: Camping Orange Valley
description: Lovely quiet place, good showers and spacious

name: At river Mureş
description: Flat spot at the river bank. Quiet after 23:00. Not far from a big sports area with public toilettes, open from 7:00 to 22:00. Restaurant 500m away. 30min. walk to City center.

name: Camping Colibita
description:
Nice little camping directly at the lake.
Only basic services, no hot shower, when we were there.
Last 2 km are dirt road. May be difficult for normal big camper vans.
4x4 not required. 
They also rent huts.
60 Lei for van/place/2 persons w/o elec.

name: de Vuurplaats
description:
Nice little, perfect real campsite. Everything there, everything clean. Even a little liberary. Good bakery nearby.
At Moldau river. 
Good place for a rest and service stop.
85 Lei per van/place/2 persons w/o elec.

name: Parking at Peles Castle
description: No facilities, busy during the day, quiet after 5pm at daytime you have to pay 40lei overnight it is free

name: Forest Park
description: Multiple camping choices in this area. The road ends at a carpark with barbeques, playgrounds and walking trails in the forest.  you can definitely camp there but we followed the dirt track down the slope and the field opens up to offer unlimited choices.  Some locals during the day but quiet at night.

name: Camping camelia
description:
little beautiful Camping place, place for couple of van/camper, few tends and some small houses for rent.
nice big outside kitchen, well organized, and clean under a big roof, with table and seats. speak english, german and romanian. we didnt stay there because our trucks were to big, but they show us a nice place in the nature where we could stay, and give us a glass of fresh made strawberry jam.
lovely people, and really nice place there.

name: Edge of Water
description: This is an ideal little spot before or after visiting Bucharest.  There's a large dirt area well off the paved road but if you follow the little dirt track along the water's edge for 100 metres you come to the dead end which we used to spend the night.  Right on the water, great views of the big houses across the way and tucked in behind the trees so the road can't see you.  Might be visited by fishermen.

name: Strada Garii
description:
Big paved and leveled parking lot with a nice view. Good for a night.
Toilets are accessible, at least for women. Toilet and water tap are working, toilet room is pretty clean.
A bigger supermarket is on the other side of the road, accessible by a bridge nearby. Mobile connection worked well (Orange)

name: Sea break wall at Plaja Pescarie
description: We found this quirky and quiet place to camp in a spot surrounded by giant concrete sea barrier blocks like giant chess pieces.  There's quite a bit of rubbish but the nice little beach and sunrise made up for it.

name: Joerg the goat
description: Nice meadow right next to the TET (Trans Euro Trail) with a lot of sun until sunset. There was nobody in the night and it was very quiet. A funny, probably escaped goat (Joerg) kept company with us. Coming here requires hard offroading, so don't try it without a proper off-road vehicle.

name: Quiet place close to the highway
description: As soon as you leave the highway you will find a grass path on your right Hand, some campers are using the place, and seems secure. Maybe beautiful views tomorrow

name: Unix Piese Auto
description:
We came here because the leaf spring of our Mercedes Sprinter broke. The staff is friendly, ordered the spare parts and one day later, they changed all the stuff. Costs: 120€ for the leaf spring, 90€ for the work (2.5 hrs)
A reliable workshop with fair prices and friendly people, doing good work.

The mechanics do not speak English, one of them barely a few words in German, but the wife of the owner is speaking a bit of English, which makes it easier to communicate with the mechanics.

name: Further up the creek behind the monastery
description: If you go a further one kilometre up the creek beyond the last place on the map you find this quiet little patch of grass off a gravel logging track behind an abandoned hut.  Much more private and quieter but we did have cows walk through in the evening.

name: curve
description: The spot is just in front of the road, you can fit a big rig (8m), but the curves are narrow. The road its only used by the locals, we ask the guys in the houses up there, but they dont allow is to sleep in the mini town, dont continue the gravel road, its very steep and you need 4x4

name: top of the mountain
description: Nice place, beautiful views and a lot of wind. There is a huge flat place to park

name: Next to TRQZ lake
description: While the official campsite was closed (off season on thursday), we followed the road next to the entrance. We found a flat surface and another lake. Quiet and open area.

name: Margina - Farmland
description: Nice hidden place, easy to access, good for a night. Mobile connections working slow (Orange)

name: Farmland
description: Nice and fairly hidden place, easy to access and good for a night. Mobile connection worked well so far (Orange).

name: Ialomita River
description: Nice place under trees right on the river bank. Quiet and clean. Good internet reception. From the main road take the gravel road to the river. 4x4 is not required.

name: Wine cellar "Crama Mierla Alba"
description: Small, traditional wine cellar with very good wines. Nice location. The owner speaks good English. Recommendation :)

name: Water
description: Cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles. Parking very possible.

name: La Iluian
description: Very nice place. Beautiful terrace, very friendly service and delicious food at affordable prices. Recommendation

name: Water
description: Cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles. Parking possible.

name: Nice view near Nucet
description: Beautiful place with a fantastic view. Also shady and quiet except for a few sheep. Take the dirt road up the curve in Nucet. 4x4 and ground clearance necessary, dry conditions advantageous. For large vehicles rather problematic because of deep trees. The shepherds are happy about a cigarette

name: Panorama view near Păuleni
description: Nice place with a fantastic panoramic view. Take the dirt road uphill near the village of Păuleni. 4x4, ground clearance and love of off-road sports are necessary. Grassy ground, shade possible and very quiet. Good internet reception.

name: Water Păuleni
description: Cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles. Parking possible.

name: Water
description: Cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles. Parking possible.

name: Shop with traditional products
description: Very nice shop with many traditional products (liquor, syrup, tea, jam, pastries, wood and much more). The owner speaks good English.

name: Water
description: Cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles. Parking possible.

name: Water Schitul Vovidenia
description: Fountain with cold drinking water at the monastery of Shitul Vovidenia. Probably only accessible during opening hours.

name: Along "Monastery route"
description: There are many camping opportunities along "Monastery route". Directly by the stream, in the shade or in the sun, sometimes with a picnic area. No internet reception.

name: Hut ruins Cabana Irina
description: Nice place with a great view of the mountains next to the collapsed hut Cabana Irina. The street below can be heard but is quiet at night. Take the dirt road at the pass of the main road. 4x4 is an advantage. Internet reception good.

name: Water
description: Cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles.

name: Prislop Pass
description: At Prislop Pass there are many camping options with beautiful views - sunny or shady. Take the gravel road right at the pass and find your most beautiful place 4x4 is not necessary. Internet reception acceptable.

name: Cascada
description: Cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles.

name: Sacel
description: Fountain with plenty of cold water and the locals fill their drinking bottles. Parking very possible.

name: Roadside
description: Quiet and very nice spot with a view and a clean picnic place. Internet reception slow. We are traveling with 4x4 but the locals drive with normal cars. Take the gravel road uphill from the main road.

name: Dealu Botii
description: Very quiet place with a beautiful view of the lake and the mountains. An old lady from the village of Dealu Botii informed us that camping is not a problem. At the end of August there are a lot of ripe blueberries and cranberries. Internet reception is okay. Take the gravel road in and through the village of Dealu Botii. 4x4 is not necessary.

name: Hwy 1R
description: A lot of cold and good water. The locals told us that they come from far away to fill their many drinking bottles. Parking possible.

name: Roadside
description: Nice place with cold water spring and the locals fill their drinking bottles.

name: Near Padiş - Roadside
description: Nice place right next to the gravel road. Level and grassy, ​​sunny or shady under big trees. Quiet and without mosquitoes. Slow internet reception. 4x4 not necessary.

name: Alegria Camping
description: camping near the river. A very nice location with all facilities, electricity, water, internet, wc, toilets, etc

name: public free campsite
description: The camping its located in front of a creek, no amenities, but the locals use it to bring their caravans mainly on weekends, its a big area, big rigs can fit, and some benches are public. There is garbage (mainly plastic), that the others visitors left

name: parking behind Lidl
description: Huge space behind the Lidl supermarket, if you for close to the wall you can even have free WiFi. Big rigs fits, maybe some Young people during the weekends making some noise, but it doesnt bother us

name: Marians House - Camping
description:
Marian lives with his mother, they offer a space in their garden to put your tent.
Kitchen, bathroom, etc are shared with them.
Friendly, welcoming, not too warm with tent, clean, very close to the main road.

Price per person 25Lei with a tent.

You can call or text : +40 (0)728 007 036 

he speaks English, she speaks french

name: Wild camping
description: A flat (almost) place in some fields, you can hear dogs barking far away, but no people were seeing. 800m from the speedway

name: Behind Lidl
description: Nice place, 15 min walking to the city center, with a kids playground, but the parking spaces are max for 6 m of lenght

name: Castle Parking
description: Amazing place just in front of the castle, the guard was very nice and opened the entrance to park free. Amazing place

name: water fountain
description: Water, next to the road, you can park in both sides

name: Camping Cheile Turzii
description:
The official campsite for Cheile Turzii (camping within park not allowed). Toilets, shower, roofed kitchen with gas stoves, tables, electricity for charging devices, fridgerator, sinks, and WiFi. Price was totally worth it (1 night 4x4+1person 50lei/~10€), check-out at 11AM. Really kind host, and beautiful area. Also chalets available. 
A zipline goes past next to the campground, so during the day you can hear some visitors screaming and laughing as they wizz in the air!

name: Bran Donation Camping
description: A nice spot 2.5 km from Bran Castle, there is a dry toilet and water, they don't charge but there is a donation box.

name: Hotel parking
description: We ask the guy if we could park here, he said yes. Another camper was by our side. Its a big space suitable for 30 cars at least.

name: Camping Lake TRQX
description:
Campsite not marked as such yet at the street. It is signed as private property but they do run the campsite. 
No showers yet, but toilets do work. Nice view over the private lake. More water sports activity are in the building process.

name: Parking
description: Parking spot next to a tennis court, rigs 7m max. can park here. Very quiet place

name: CZI camp
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: Owner contribution, requires check-in to verify

Welcome to our 5000 sqm fenced property, nestled in a picturesque and tranquil location. This diverse land features a portion of lush forest and a well-maintained grassy area. Accessible via a gravel road, the property is suitable for non-4x4 vehicles during the summer, while 4x4 vehicles are recommended during the winter months.

Situated near Meresti cave (Varghis Gorge), a breathtaking natural cave that can be explored during a 4-5 hour hike, my property offers a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in nature and enjoy complete privacy.

Whether you're seeking a camping spot, a peaceful picnic area, or simply a place to spend the night, my property provides everything you need. Take pleasure in the beauty of nature, wander through the lush forest, or relax in the well-maintained grassy area.

name: martino racing 2nd hand srl
description: An absolutely obligatory stop for motorbike trips in Transylvania. Andrea is a true motorcyclist as well as an international enduro rider. Passionate, competent, ingenious, available to solve any motorcycling need, from small and large technical assistance, to the availability of spare parts, up to tours on road and off-road routes throughout Europe. Comfortable spaces, wonderful landscape and lots of friendliness. SUPER.

name: 73C Roadside
description:
Next to 73C, with a place to camp along a small paved road. It's on a hill, with a view over the sunset and the valley. No houses nearby, but the sounds of traffic are noticeable and the cars are visible. Locals do drive this small road now and then (and stopped to enjoy the view), but it was so calm and safe I didn't bother covering any windows.
Plenty of forest downhill on the other side for relieving oneself. There's trash around, you can do good by taking a few with you. A mouse(?) walked on my roof at night, wouldn't leave food out!

name: Private spots riverside
description:
On the north side of the river is an unpaved road not visible on maps. It begins downhill right next to Hidrocentrala Arpaşu, which you can put on Google Maps. 
There are a lot of spots to camp, high clearance/4x4 helpful. Locals were fishing/having picnics along here, but I drove to the end of the road and didn't set eyes upon another human during my 2-night stay. Very private. No 3G/4G, but signal works mostly.
Difficult to turn at the very end, I recommend walking the road first if unsure if your vechicle can go there, but a bit before the end there is a wider area more suitable for turning. Please take some trash with you!

name: Roadside
description: Good place for motorbike câmp. Grass. Quiet. Near the country road.

name: Autumn Marketplace. Negreni
description: Autumn marketplace is an open-air event for shopping.

name: Casa Rudi & Ella
description: Really nice campground in the backyard of a family home. Hot showers, kitchen, clean toilets, wifi... Paid 30lei for one person in a tent woth motorcycle.

name: Lake Mocearu
description: Nice free camping spot close to Mocearu lake. Very nice in autumn, full of color.

name: water
description: Potable water, near the road. With parking.

name: Hotel Leul de Aur
description: Real close to Transalpina entrance. Private parking for motorcycles. Rooms and food are great with reasonable prices. Staff is friendly. Absolutely recommend the place to anyone going through Transalpina and looking for a place to sleep in Sebes.

name: Casa Bica – Markus Roepke
description:
House No. 470 in 507045 Cincu.
Old farmhouse under reconstruction with two yards. Accessible for 2x4 up to 3.10m height. Markus speaks german, english and french and is always happy to have visitors/overlander.
Outhouse toilet available, water as well. Facilities will be improved and extended in 2024 and 2025.
